name: Ossified Undead
background:
The Ossified Undead are creatures of bone and magic in human shape. Their legions march slowly and with terrible purpose, cutting down any who oppose them. 

The Ossified Undead destroyed all life in their Plane in order to escape the influence of a mighty Plague Daemon, preserving their people as deathless constructs. When they discovered Tyria, they hoped to escape their lifeless plane, but were betrayed and banished back to their home. However, the Great Rift opened new portals to Tyria again, and now they are determined to avenge their betrayal and claim their new home by force.
backgroundFull:
The native plane of the Ossified Undead was a verdant and tranquil place until the eye of the Plague God fell upon it. Under the malign influence of Plague, the world began to rot and wither. As the world around them fell into decay, the remaining Sages gathered to make a plan: they studied strange and dark magic that would allow them to transcend the weaknesses of flesh that the Havoc God preyed upon, and they would become beings of bone and spirit beyond death. Some rejected this, but many more were desperate enough to embrace the idea and become the Ossified Undead. 

While those who rejected the Sages died out to disease and corruption, the Ossified Undead began to purge their lands of life. They drove back the Plague God’s servants until their plane was saved, but no living thing remained. After this, the Ossified Undead lived in peace for a time. None are certain how long this was, as without life, time soon lost any meaning. Some fell into insanity or despair. The Sages were once more charged with seeking a solution.

The Sages’ hopes were lifted when they discovered a Voidgate created by a strange sage from the plane of Tyria, who begged for help to protect his people. After some discussion, the Sages agreed to offer their knowledge, and in exchange, they asked for the right to settle in Tyria. While they provided their knowledge willingly, the Tyrians betrayed their side of the deal and severed their link with the Ossified Undead plane once the Havoc Wars were over. 

The Ossified Undead and their Sages tried to reopen the link many times without success. Their opportunity only came when the Rift devastated Tyria, and they could take advantage of the sudden surge of energy that created the rift in order to open previously lost Voidgates throughout Tyria. 

The Ossified Undead have begun to enter Tyria, returning once more to a land of life, but now view other factions with distrust, remembering their previous betrayal. Yet they are determined to make their home for their people in Tyria, even if they have to fight every other faction in Tyria to do it. 

How will you carve out a new home in this plane of life?

spells.name: Bone Breaker
spells.effect: Pick one enemy unit within 18", which takes 6 hits.

specialRules.name: Sergeant
specialRules.description: When this model attacks, unmodified results of 6 to hit deal 1 extra hit (only the original hit counts as a 6 for special rules).

specialRules.name: Precise
specialRules.description: Gets +1 to hit when attacking.

specialRules.name: Unpredictable Fighter
specialRules.description: When in melee, roll one die and apply one effect to all models with this rule: on a 1-3 they get AP(+1), and on a 4-6 they get +1 to hit rolls instead.

specialRules.name: Ossified
specialRules.description: When units where all models have this rule are shot or charged from over 9" away and take hits, those hits count as having AP(-1), to a min. of AP(0).

specialRules.name: Breath Attack
specialRules.description: Once per activation, before attacking, roll one die. On a 2+ one enemy unit within 6" in line of sight takes 1 hit with Blast(3) and AP(1).

specialRules.name: Swift
specialRules.description: This model may ignore the Slow rule.

specialRules.name: Armor
specialRules.description: Counts as having Defense X+.

specialRules.name: Destructive
specialRules.description: On unmodified results of 6 to hit, those hits get AP(+4).

specialRules.name: Spell Accumulator
specialRules.description: Gets X accumulator tokens at the start of each round, but can’t hold more than 6 tokens at once. Casters from other friendly units within 12" may spend this model's accumulator tokens as if they were their own spell tokens.

specialRules.name: No Retreat Aura
specialRules.description: This model and its unit get No Retreat.

specialRules.name: Infiltrate
specialRules.description: Counts as having Ambush, but may be deployed up to 1" away from enemy units.

specialRules.name: Precision Feat
specialRules.description: Once per game, when this unit attacks and all its models have this rule, you may use this rule so that they get +2 to hit rolls.

specialRules.name: Mobile Artillery
specialRules.description: When this model uses a Hold action and shoots at enemies over 9" away, it gets +1 to hit rolls. As long this model hasn't moved during the round, when enemy units shoot at it from over 9" away, they get -2 to hit rolls.

specialRules.name: Evasive Aura
specialRules.description: This model and its unit get Evasive.

specialRules.name: Swift Aura
specialRules.description: This model and its unit get Swift.

specialRules.name: Piercing Shooter
specialRules.description: This model gets AP(+1) when shooting.

specialRules.name: Relentless Aura
specialRules.description: This model and its unit get Relentless.

specialRules.name: Regeneration Aura
specialRules.description: This model and its unit get Regeneration.

specialRules.name: Precision Feat Aura
specialRules.description: This model and its unit get Precision Feat.

specialRules.name: Bane in Melee Aura
specialRules.description: This model and its unit get Bane in melee.

specialRules.name: Furious Mark
specialRules.description: Once per activation, before attacking, pick one enemy unit within 18", which friendly units gets Furious against once (next time the effect would apply).

specialRules.name: Ossified Boost Aura
specialRules.description: This model and its unit get Ossified Boost.

specialRules.name: Regeneration Buff
specialRules.description: Once per activation, before attacking, pick one friendly unit within 12", which gets Regeneration once (next time the effect would apply).

specialRules.name: AP
specialRules.description: Targets get -X to Defense rolls when blocking hits.

specialRules.name: Blast
specialRules.description: Ignores cover, and after resolving other special rules, each hit is multiplied by X, where X is up to as many hits as models in the target unit.

specialRules.name: Slow
specialRules.description: Moves -2" when using Advance, and -4” when using Rush/Charge.

specialRules.name: Defense
specialRules.description: This model gets +X to defense rolls.

specialRules.name: Caster
specialRules.description: Gets X spell tokens at the start of each round, but can’t hold more than 6 tokens at once. At any point before attacking, spend as many tokens as the spell’s value to try casting one or more spells (only one try per spell). Roll one die, on 4+ resolve the effect on a target in line of sight. Models within 18” in line of sight of the caster’s unit may spend any number of spell tokens at the same time before rolling, to give the caster +1/-1 to the roll per token.

specialRules.name: No Retreat
specialRules.description: When a unit where most models have this rule fails a morale test that causes it to be Shaken or Routed, the test counts as passed instead. Then, roll as many dice as the number of wounds it would take to fully destroy it, and for each result of 1-3 the unit takes one wound, which can't be ignored.

specialRules.name: Ambush
specialRules.description: May be set aside before deployment. At the start of any round after the first, may be deployed anywhere over 9” away from enemy units. Players alternate in placing Ambush units, starting with the player that activates next. Units that deploy via Ambush can’t seize or contest objectives on the round they deploy.

specialRules.name: Evasive
specialRules.description: Enemies get -1 to hit rolls when attacking units where all models have this rule.

specialRules.name: Relentless
specialRules.description: When this model shoots at enemies over 9" away, unmodified results of 6 to hit deal 1 extra hit (only the original hit counts as a 6 for special rules).

specialRules.name: Regeneration
specialRules.description: When a unit where all models have this rule takes wounds, roll one die for each. On a 5+ it is ignored.

specialRules.name: Bane
specialRules.description: Ignores Regeneration, and when attacking the target must re-roll unmodified Defense results of 6.

specialRules.name: Furious
specialRules.description: When charging, unmodified results of 6 to hit in melee deal 1 extra hit (only the original hit counts as a 6 for special rules).

specialRules.name: Ossified Boost
specialRules.description: If all models in this unit have Ossified, enemy hits always count as having AP(-1) from Ossified (instead of only when being shot/charged from over 9" away).

specialRules.name: Unstoppable
specialRules.description: Ignores Regeneration, and ignores all negative modifiers to this weapon.
